channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 美联储讲话再成焦点，股市涨势停滞不前 ⤵️- 交易员密切关注周五美联储的几位发言人--美国银行称美联储会议前股市遭遇大量资金外流获取实时市场更新：
item.description:
Stock rally stalls with Fedspeak back in focus ⤵️

- Traders keeping an eye on handful of Fed speakers on Friday
- BofA says stocks suffer big outflows in run-up to Fed meeting

Get live markets updates:https://t.co/fVGReAXrYy pic.twitter.com/hjhxy4gxMQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国在联合国安理会否决了美国支持的加沙停火决议，该决议还包括谴责哈马斯 10 月 7 日对以色列的袭击。
item.description:
Russia and China vetoed a US-backed resolution in the UN Security Council for a cease-fire in Gaza that also included a condemnation of Hamas' Oct. 7 attack on Israel https://t.co/n3v2k2g8EO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 与竞争对手一样，瑞典债务催收公司 Intrum 也利用巨额杠杆为其在不良贷款上的赌注提供资金。现在，它正努力应对
item.description:
Like its rivals, Swedish debt collector Intrum took on massive leverage to fund its wager on bad loans.

Now it’s struggling to cope https://t.co/SY0joYjLv4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 随着美国和欧盟当局将矛头指向苹果服务业务的方方面面，一位投资者表示，苹果股票可能会 "死一段时间"。
item.description:
As US and EU authorities target aspects of Apple’s services business, an investor says the stock could be “dead money for a while” https://t.co/rrNt8FWIs9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 现在Lululemon 开盘下挫 15%，创 2020 年以来最大跌幅。更多彭博市场报道，请点击此处：
item.description:
NOW: Lululemon sinks 15% at the open in its biggest drop since 2020. More from the Bloomberg markets wrap here: https://t.co/5P7Cp3HCFd pic.twitter.com/iHUq5JvRRO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 由于需求疲软和国家核电机组的强劲表现，法国电力价格延续跌势
item.description:
French power prices extended their decline due to weak demand and robust performance from the nation’s nuclear fleet https://t.co/ABLOoneR88

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一位前马士基高管正在建立一家由全球超级富豪支持的投资公司，此前他领导的风险投资部门为这家航运巨头带来了约四倍的收益
item.description:
A former Maersk executive is building an investment firm backed by the world’s super-rich after leading a venture unit that notched roughly fourfold gains for the shipping giant https://t.co/rH2BjB2BF3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 加拿大 2 月份零售额略有回升，但未能抵消年初的大幅下降，这表明消费支出的势头正在减弱。
item.description:
A slight rebound in Canadian retail sales in February failed to offset a steeper drop at the start of the year, signaling fading momentum in consumer spending. https://t.co/Dy7Vc0ZIUz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一家拥有百年历史的美国谷物贸易商正在寻求更多收购，以加快发展步伐，并从面临利润紧缩的竞争对手身上看到了商机。
item.description:
A century-old US grains trader is hunting for more acquisitions to accelerate its growth, seeing bargains in competitors facing a profit squeeze https://t.co/BxnMFMKTeu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在中国放松对人民币的控制令市场感到震惊之后，印度卢比跌至历史最低收盘水平，追随新兴市场同类货币兑美元的跌势。
item.description:
The Indian rupee fell to a record low closing level, tracking declines in emerging market peers against the dollar, after China jolted markets by loosening its grip on the yuan https://t.co/dLe4sF3PvM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 独家新闻：欧洲证券与金融管理局（ESMA）将错过 10 月的最后期限，无法确定加密货币是否有资格被纳入欧盟最受欢迎的投资基金类型之一。
item.description:
exclusive: ESMA will miss an Oct. deadline to determine if crypto should be eligible for inclusion in one of the EU's most popular types of investment fund. it's also set to determine whether delivery of crypto rules like MiCA should be phased in stages https://t.co/899iDnadbN

— Emily Nicolle (@emilyjnicolle) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新的经济和企业数据表明，英国短暂而肤浅的经济衰退已经结束。英国央行希望在经济复苏的同时降低利率，廉价的英国股票将从中受益。
item.description:
The latest economic and corporate data suggests that the UK's short and shallow recession is already over. And with the Bank of England hoping to cut interest rates even as the economy recovers, cheap UK stocks could well benefit. https://t.co/reEC3xQRKy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在乌克兰无人机连续袭击几个主要设施后，俄罗斯的日均炼油率降至 10 个月来的最低水平
item.description:
Russia’s average daily oil refining rate fell to the lowest weekly level in 10 months after a flurry of Ukrainian drone attacks hit several major facilities https://t.co/eGuRDEvtCF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）小幅增持了 Reddit 股票，因为该社交媒体平台在首次上市时涨势迅猛。
item.description:
Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management scooped up a small position in Reddit shares as the social media platform rallied in its market debut. https://t.co/dsey21kp4J

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德对欧元区领导人表示，欧元区通胀放缓的趋势预计将持续下去
item.description:
The easing in euro-area inflation is expected to persist, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde told euro-area leaders https://t.co/J9qSs3Oht1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 激进投资者埃利奥特入股英国最知名的科技投资基金之一
item.description:
Activist investor Elliott builds a stake in one of the UK’s best-known technology-focused investment funds https://t.co/IKubgfI5VB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在智利阿塔卡马沙漠边缘，世界上最大的锂提炼厂之一即将变得更大
item.description:
On the edge of Chile’s Atacama Desert, one of the world’s biggest lithium refineries is about to get a lot bigger https://t.co/0NdccdSZNj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: Jason Goldberg 的每日 "银行简报 "已从 20 年前的一份简短说明发展成为一份精心制作的文件，其中记录了从行政评论和监管变化到经济数据和股票走势的所有内容。
item.description:
Jason Goldberg’s daily “Bank Brief” has evolved from a brief note 20 years ago into a polished document keeping track of everything from executive comments and regulatory changes to economic data and stock moves. https://t.co/iLw5vnbvUv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: @wenkennedy 写道："如果您想用一个词来概括 S&P Global 今年的 CERAWeek，那就试试这个词：需求。
item.description:
If you’re looking for a word to sum up this year’s CERAWeek by S&P Global, try this one: demand, writes @wenkennedy https://t.co/KQInezW2bL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一家受到英国制裁的迪拜航运公司正试图挑战英国的限制，称自己在短暂的历史中从未加入过俄罗斯的 "影子船队"。
item.description:
A Dubai-based shipping firm that’s sanctioned by the UK is seeking to challenge the restrictions, saying it has never been part of Russia’s shadow fleet in its short history https://t.co/CkzsPvCMxc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 大量俄罗斯柴油漂浮在海上，表明莫斯科很难为这些柴油找到归宿
item.description:
Large volumes of Russian diesel are floating at sea, a sign that Moscow is finding it difficult to find homes for the barrels https://t.co/kk8F6aIYOW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 荷兰政府正在游说联合利华将其价值 170 亿欧元的冰淇淋部门在荷兰上市
item.description:
The Dutch government is lobbying Unilever to list its €17 billion ice-cream unit in the Netherlands https://t.co/Wd0QSnnunb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 杰瑞-宋飞（Jerry Seinfeld）因其情景喜剧的持久成功而成为亿万富翁
item.description:
Jerry Seinfeld is a billionaire thanks to the enduring success of his sitcom https://t.co/O4bsymbx1p

item.title: 🇪🇬 在短短几周内，埃及摆脱了数十年来最严重的货币危机，成为新兴市场中最热门的行业。那么，下一步是什么？
item.description:
🇪🇬 In a few short weeks, Egypt emerged from its worst currency crisis in decades to become the hottest trade in emerging markets.

So, what's next? https://t.co/00OH2xtm1z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 马库斯-约斯特（Markus Jooste）是丑闻缠身的零售商斯坦霍夫（Steinhoff）的前首席执行官，已于周四去世。
item.description:
Markus Jooste, the former chief executive officer of scandal-ridden retailer Steinhoff who died Thursday, had been told to hand himself over to South African police https://t.co/Ow4gFXZMxC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 复活节即将来临，但巧克力之所以现在如此火爆，是因为可可供应出现了恐慌。
item.description:
Easter is coming, but the reason why chocolate is so hot right now is down to the panic over cocoa supplies https://t.co/JdHjoDXbCu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 德国议会上议院通过了一项经过稀释的法案，为企业提供 32 亿欧元的减税措施，结束了数月来的争论
item.description:
Germany’s upper house of parliament passes a watered-down bill to provide €3.2 billion of tax-relief measures for companies, ending months of wrangling https://t.co/sLPLbP7wFV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 冰岛是世界上平等程度最高的国家，将成为第一个借钱用于改善性别差距的国家
item.description:
Iceland, a country that ranks highest in the world for equality, will become the first nation to borrow money to spend on improving the gender gap https://t.co/44xRIaNrPa

item.title: 乌克兰的无人机袭击了占俄罗斯石油提炼能力十分之一以上的设施，但实际减少的原油加工量可能只有这个数字的一半
item.description:
Ukraine’s drones have hit facilities accounting for more than a tenth of Russia’s oil-refining capacity, but the actual reduction in crude processing may be just half that size https://t.co/OqyY90VWw3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024
